translations: v.避免，防止；回避，避开；撤销，使无效

sentences.sentence: We have tried to avoid any moralizing.
sentences.translation: 我们已力图避免任何形式的说教。

sentences.sentence: They avoid going out alone after dark.
sentences.translation: 他们避免黄昏后独自出门。

sentences.sentence: He tends to avoid all physical contact.
sentences.translation: 他倾向于避免一切身体接触。
